m_szDocSumamry: Energy industry news, analysis, and commentary By Anne M. Stark | U.S. Department of Energy on November 05, 2015 at 5:00 PM   These researchers are part of a team studying the use of hydrogen for longer-lasting batteries. | Photos by Julie Russell, LLNL. Lawrence Livermore Nation al Laboratory scientists have found that lithium ion batteries operate longer and faster when their electrodes are treated with hydrogen.
